title: Unable to register Windows Store developer account in British Virgin Islands
body: We would like to register as a developer in Windows Store. But BVI is missing in the list of countries . Please add.

comments.body: We are developers of popular Advanced IP Scanner with 20+ million users. Please add British ****** Islands to supported countries list in Windows Store account registration. We'll be able to register the account for our BVI company and provide our users an ability to download Advanced IP Scanner from the Windows Store.
